example.name: layer-lhrh4
example.description: Demonstration of how to encode three musical lines on two staves when the middle line transfers to a different staff half-way through a measure. Beethoven piano sonata no. 4 in E-flat major, op. 7, mvmt. 1: Allegro molto con brio.

file.name: lhrh4.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: lhrh4.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
